thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Joshua A Gelber
thread.title_full: FlightNetwork.com reviewed by Joshua A Gelber

author: Joshua A Gelber
title: Joshua A Gelber
text: I've booked over the phone a few times; this was a complete online booking, finding the great rates available, and I couldn't be happier. The only nuisance is flight prices juggling up and down day to day - but I got luckier in my timing, and it's done like dinner!
